title: Future Reminder
message: Keep moving forward, your future self will thank you for today’s efforts!

title: New Year Reflection
message: A fresh start, a new chapter – embrace the lessons of the past and step into the future with hope!

title: Hidden Surprise
message: A little gift from the past, reminding you that magic exists in small moments. Enjoy this surprise!

title: Archived Memory
message: Memories are treasures of the heart. May this remind you of something special worth cherishing.

title: Deleted Capsule
message: Some things are meant to be let go, but every experience shapes you. Take the lessons and keep growing!

title: mimi
message: A secret between past and future you – whatever it is, remember to smile and stay true to yourself.

message: A special moment is waiting for you. Open this with excitement, and relive the joy!

message: A reminder that every ending is just a new beginning. Trust the journey ahead!

message: Time flies, but memories remain. This is a piece of your past, waiting to be remembered.

message: Some memories fade, but those that matter always find their way back to us. Enjoy this one!

message: An echo from the past, reminding you of who you were and how far you’ve come. Keep growing!
